review: Visited for PregnancyAfter 2 abortions, on my friend's suggestion we payed a visit to Dr sravani and on the first meet itself we got confirmed that she is the one we are waiting for. We are totally satisfied with her treatment and moral words. whenever I called her in any time she is picking my call and answering, I never seen this type of doctor anywhere. Because of you only We are now proud parents for baby boyThank you ista clinic from the bottom of our heart and you Guyz truly deserve this. Keep the good work going. All the very best Dr sravani mam. We will be thankful always.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Exercise,
review:
Dr Sravani, is not only an excellent doctor, she is simple, approachable, superb human being, her friendly approach with always smiling faces is creates the positivity.
We’ve consulted her for our first pregnanacy and the way she treated is not forgottable, She is very clear in the things and treatment, she always talks openly and communicate the right thing, we’ve visited several times and consulted her within less (1-2mins) of wait time and finally we are blessed with the baby. I strongly recommend her, Thank you Sravani for all your support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy,Pregnancy care and management,Child Birth Education,Child Vaccination,Pregnancy Tests,
review:
Dr. Sravani holds always a special place in our hearts as she treated my wife during her first pregnancy and we know her since 7 years and now. I still remember every single visit we had during the 9 months time and the day when she handed me my little angel to my hands after hours of waiting and around 3 am in the morning.

Her commitment towards her patients make her unique and never a go back for monetary benefits. Almost 14 families and friends of mine after seeing what we had experienced visited her and all their lives are very happy and blessed with little ones.

She is not just a normal doctor for us rather a special one who took care of my wife, baby and my mother too. 

I strongly recommend her, based on so much of experience me and my known families had.

Thanks Sravani mam.

She was always available on phone when ever I had any doubts regarding any doubt.For my girl child I had my C- Section delivery will madam and all the experience  was good. She is very friendly, suggests and explains everything openly.  She is like my all time Gynec.
